results.content: It provided a clear picture of how to use an API in rails, this is what i was looking for thank yo uso much!

results.content: Really well put together course with lots of info. Doesn't get bogged down in details that don't matter, but is good at describing/explaining the details that do matter
results.content_html: Really well put together course with lots of info. Doesn't get bogged down in details that don't matter, but is good at describing/explaining the details that do matter

results.content: Great explanatory video and content. I finally learned how to consume a third party API using Ruby on Rails.
results.content_html: Great explanatory video and content. I finally learned how to consume a third party API using Ruby on Rails.

results.content: While this isn't the first or the longest Ruby on Rails course I've taken, I learned how to connect to an API using RoR from this one. I've taken another Ruby course from John and he has a very engaging way of getting the material across. Highly recommended!
results.content_html: While this isn't the first or the longest Ruby on Rails course I've taken, I learned how to connect to an API using RoR from this one. I've taken another Ruby course from John and he has a very engaging way of getting the material across. Highly recommended!
